item.description:
Afterwork Mixer at Friday October 22th at Noir inside the The Charles Hotel!


Let's meet for drinks at Noir - one of the nicest bars in Harvard Square. This small, upscale bar is a nice venue for new and old members to meet. If you are a new member or have not yet been to an afterwork mixer, I encourage you to come out and see why this is one of the best meetups in Boston.

Meeting Details: While we won't have a designated area for the group, I will try to get tables near the entrance. Please join me when you arrive, grab a drink and make new friends. My picture is on the left hand side of the website under the Assistant Organizer section and my phone is 410-404-4236. Look forward to seeing you all there!

Public Transportation: Red Line to Harvard Square


Kanwar

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Afterwork Drinks at Noir! Friday, October 22nd!
